sentences.en: And here we go for the heavyweight championship of the world.
sentences.cn: 在这里我们要角逐出世界重量级拳击冠军.

sentences.en: But you're the only man to ever beat the current heavyweight champion.
sentences.cn: 可是你是能打败现在重量级拳击冠军的唯一人选.

sentences.en: He had been a heavyweight prize - fighter.
sentences.cn: 他曾经是重量级职业拳击手.

sentences.en: He reckons on being world heavyweight champion.
sentences.cn: 他相信自己能成为世界重量级冠军。

sentences.en: He united the three major heavyweight titles for the first time in nine years.
sentences.cn: 他首次在九年内独揽了重量级的三个桂冠.

sentences.en: He won the world heavyweight title.
sentences.cn: 他赢得世界最重量级拳击冠军.

sentences.en: In showing contempt for the heavyweight championship Douglas offended a stern code.
sentences.cn: 道格拉斯藐视重量级拳王称号的行为违背了严格的准则。

sentences.en: Ladies and gentlemen, the heavyweight champion oftheworld has arrived!
sentences.cn: 女士们先生们, 世界重量级拳王来了!

sentences.en: Lewis is matched against the WBO's heavyweight champion, Tommy Morrison.
sentences.cn: 刘易斯对决世界拳击组织的重量级拳王汤米·莫里森。

sentences.en: one of the heavyweights of the movie industry
Pay - per - view was down 50 % from the last heavyweight title fight.
sentences.cn: 收视率比上次重量级拳击争霸赛下滑了50%.

sentences.en: Rocky Balboa has knocked the reigning heavyweight champion down!
sentences.cn: 洛奇巴尔博将不败拳王迪克逊击倒!

sentences.en: The heavyweight champion will be given a shot at Holyfield's world title.
sentences.cn: 这名重量级拳击冠军将尝试挑战霍利菲尔德的世界冠军头衔。

sentences.en: The new heavyweight champ of the world, Terry Conklin, has signed with me.
sentences.cn: 新的世界重量级拳击冠军, 特里·康克林, 已经和我签了.

sentences.en: They are like heavyweight boxers, trying to psych each other out and build themselves up.
sentences.cn: 他们像是重量级拳击运动员，竭力想在心理上压倒对方，树立自己的信心。

words.tran_cn: 重量级拳击手；有影响的人物；聪明绝顶的人

phrases.tran_cn: 重量级职业拳击手；轻重量级运动员

trans.tran_cn: [体]重量级拳击[摔跤]运动员，体重超过平均水平的人，要人，重要的人物
trans.tran_en: someone or something that is very important or has a lot of influence
